scripts.//: Default start points to start:safe to keep CI stable and avoid OOM (exit 137)
scripts.start:ci: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=${REACT_APP_PORT:-3000} CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=${REACT_APP_ENABLE_SOURCE_MAPS:-false} WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 NODE_OPTIONS=${NODE_OPTIONS:---max-old-space-size=256} react-scripts start
scripts.start:safe: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=${REACT_APP_PORT:-3000} CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=${REACT_APP_ENABLE_SOURCE_MAPS:-false} WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 NODE_OPTIONS=${NODE_OPTIONS:---max-old-space-size=256} react-scripts start
scripts.start:lowmem: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=${REACT_APP_PORT:-3000} CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 NODE_OPTIONS=${NODE_OPTIONS:---max-old-space-size=256} node node_modules/react-scripts/bin/react-scripts.js start
scripts.start:ultralowmem: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=${REACT_APP_PORT:-3000} CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 NODE_OPTIONS=${NODE_OPTIONS:---max-old-space-size=192} node node_modules/react-scripts/bin/react-scripts.js start
scripts.start:serve-static: node -e "const express=require('express');const app=express();const port=process.env.REACT_APP_PORT||process.env.PORT||3000;app.use(express.static('public'));app.listen(port,'0.0.0.0',()=>console.log('Static server at http://0.0.0.0:'+port));"
scripts.ci:start:ultra: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=${REACT_APP_PORT:-3000} CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 NODE_OPTIONS=${NODE_OPTIONS:---max-old-space-size=192} node node_modules/react-scripts/bin/react-scripts.js start
scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/assets && cp -r ../assets/* public/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true && [ -f public/healthz.html ] || (mkdir -p public && printf '<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\"><head><meta charset=\"UTF-8\"><title>OK</title></head><body>OK</body></html>' > public/healthz.html) && echo "postinstall: assets copied" >/dev/null
